name: Roots Rescue
description:
Roots Rescue is a 2D Platformer made originally for the Global Game Jam 2023. The theme for that years' jam was ROOTS.

This is a game about a little creature whose job is to rescue trees by killing the evil bugs in their roots.

A game made by:

Inês Dantas Ferreira & Luís Pedro Costa

Disclaimer: This was our first game jam and first time developing a game. It is far from finished but we learned a lot from it.

Thank you!
